meta.title: Mirabel N. Udeagha | International Fashion & Editorial Model
meta.description: Professional portfolio of Mirabel N. Udeagha, International Fashion & Editorial Model showcasing editorial, runway, commercial and beauty work.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: About Me
about.quote: My passion is to bring creative visions to life through fashion and editorial work.
about.paragraph1: With over 7 years in the modeling industry, I've built a reputation for versatility and professionalism. My journey began in Lagos, Nigeria, before expanding to international markets including Paris, Milan, and Abuja.
about.paragraph2: I specialize in high-fashion editorial work, runway shows, and commercial campaigns, with a particular strength in luxury and avant-garde fashion. My background in dance gives me a unique understanding of movement and form that translates into dynamic, expressive poses.
about.paragraph3: I believe that great modeling is about collaboration and bringing creative visions to life through authentic expression and technical precision.

pfw.title: Paris Fashion Week
pfw.description: Walked for Louis Vuitton and Chanel during the Spring/Summer collection shows, featured in Vogue's runway highlights.

dior.title: Dior Campaign
dior.description: Featured in Dior's international print and digital campaign for their Fall/Winter collection, shot by renowned photographer Annie Leibovitz.

elle.title: Elle Magazine Cover
elle.description: Featured on the cover of Elle Magazine's September issue, with a 10-page editorial spread discussing fashion and sustainability.

nyfw.title: New York Fashion Week
nyfw.description: Opened for Michael Kors and closed for Marc Jacobs during NYFW, receiving significant media coverage for both appearances in Abuja and internationally.

img.title: Signed with IMG Models
img.description: Joined the prestigious IMG Models agency, representing their Abuja, Paris, and Milan divisions.

fashion.title: Fashion & Editorial
fashion.description: Professional modeling for high-fashion editorials, magazine features, and advertising campaigns across print and digital media.

runway.title: Runway
runway.description: Experienced runway model for fashion shows, seasonal collections, and designer showcases at fashion weeks globally.

commercial.title: Commercial
commercial.description: Commercial modeling for brands, products, and services across television, digital media, and print advertisements.

beauty.title: Beauty
beauty.description: Specialized beauty modeling for cosmetics, skincare, haircare, and fragrance brands with a focus on facial features and expressions.

video.title: Video & Motion
video.description: Professional modeling for fashion films, promotional videos, social media content, and brand storytelling campaigns.

events.title: Events & Appearances
events.description: Professional appearances at fashion events, product launches, brand activations, and industry gatherings as a brand ambassador.

gucci.quote: Mirabel brings an extraordinary presence to the runway. Her ability to embody the essence of a collection and translate it through movement and expression is unparalleled. She's not just a model; she's a true artist.

vogue.quote: Working with Mirabel is always a pleasure. She understands light, angles, and composition intuitively, making every shot effortlessly elegant.

loreal.quote: Mirabel's professionalism and versatility make her a standout talent. She can transform from high fashion editorial to approachable commercial work with remarkable ease.

vogue.title: Vogue Magazine
vogue.description: Cover feature and exclusive interview discussing sustainable fashion and my journey in the modeling industry.

harpers.title: Harper's Bazaar
harpers.description: Featured in "The Future of Fashion" editorial, discussing emerging trends and the evolving modeling landscape.

elle.title: Elle Magazine
elle.description: Interview feature on balancing international modeling career with advocacy for diversity in the fashion industry.

instagram.title: Instagram
instagram.subtitle: Follow my latest work and behind-the-scenes moments
